about_the_game:
A “Thank You” to all our players for their support over the past 12 months.

This DLC unlocks 1 Helmet:

“Near Miss” Mk II Battle Damaged Helmet (British 8th Army)
There are only a few accounts of soldiers surviving damage that penetrates through the steel helmet the British used in North Africa. Making the damage to this helmet a true near miss.

This helmet is available for the following roles:
British Commander, Officer, Rifleman, Anti-Tank, Engineer, Machine Gunner, Automatic Rifleman, Assault, Medic, Support, Sniper and Spotter roles
